shadcn.import: import { Menubar, MenubarMenu, MenubarTrigger, MenubarContent, MenubarItem, MenubarSeparator } from '@/components/ui/menubar'

notes: shadcn Menubar uses Radix UI primitives; @vlting/ui uses a custom context-based implementation with native HTML buttons.
The vlting Menubar.Item has a built-in 'shortcut' prop for displaying keyboard shortcuts, while shadcn requires a separate <MenubarShortcut> component.
vlting Menubar auto-manages open state via context, with hover-switch between menus when any is open.
shadcn has additional sub-components like MenubarCheckboxItem, MenubarRadioGroup, MenubarSub etc. that are not yet implemented in vlting.

breaking.reason: Shortcut is a prop on Item, not a separate component
